PythonSnippet.value: import SimpleITK as sitk filter = sitk.MedianImageFilter() filter.SetRadius(1) mitkImage_new = filter.Execute(mitkImage)

deci = vtk.vtkDecimatePro() deci.SetInputData( mitkSurface ) deci.SetTargetReduction(0.9) deci.PreserveTopologyOn() deci.Update()
mitkSurface_new = deci.GetOutput()
coneSrc = vtk.vtkConeSource() coneSrc.SetResolution(60) coneSrc.SetCenter(-2,0,0) coneSrc.Update() cone = coneSrc.GetOutput()
